714743f.title: Manhattan: 87th Street (East) - 1st Avenue
714743f.text:
400-422 East 87th Street, at, adjoining, and east of the S.E.
corner of First Avenue. No. 406-422 is St. Joseph's Roman Catholic
Church and School.
April 7, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

714742f-a.title: Manhattan: 87th Street (East) - 1st Avenue
714742f-a.text:
East 87th Street, north side, east from (No. 427), but not including
First, to and including East End (ave. B.) Ave. Building shown at Nos.
427-429, is occupied by the Dept. of Sanitation. On the right, appears a
portion of St. Joseph's Parochial School No. 423.
July 19, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NNO REPRODUCTIONS.
yVeo~krey

707668f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 87th St.
707668f-a.text:
First avenue, east side,north from and including 87th Street,
showing men at work removing the tracks of the Second avenue
Railway.
October 9, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
